Task Requirement Affirmative.DialogueText:
Yes I am the taskmaster. You can do my tasks once you prove you're here to stay.
QUEST:Gather some monster parts to show you're ready to take on the World 4 tasks!
Task Requirement Affirmative.Name: Task Requirement Affirmative
